description: Take Greek salad to the next level with Tasmanian salmon fillets. Pan-fried to perfection, salmon elevates this much-loved salad to new heights.
name: Greek-Inspired Salmon Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place capsicum, cucumber, tomato, onion, olives, vinegar and remaining oil on a large serving platter and toss to combine. Add salmon and toss gently to combine. Sprinkle salad with feta and oregano, season with pepper and serve with pita.
